sql.name: SQL_SELECT_ADDRESS_BY_ID_FOR_UPDATE
sql.value: select address_id, province, city, distinct, detail, zip_code, company, outer_id from address where outer_id = ? for update

sql.name: SQL_INSERT_ADDRESS
sql.value: insert into address(province, city, district, county, town, detail, zio_code, actor_id, company, create_date, outer_id) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
